sentences.en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentences.cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentences.en: Family control would prevent any hostile takeover or greenmail attempt.
sentences.cn: 家族管理可以防止任何恶意收购或绿票讹诈的企图。

sentences.en: He said this would prevent companies from creating new jobs.
sentences.cn: 他说这将使公司无法创造新的工作机会。

sentences.en: He tried to prevent union money from being sequestrated by the courts.
sentences.cn: 他试图阻止法院扣押工会的资产。

sentences.en: Lemon juice can help to prevent economy-class syndrome by improving blood circulation.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁能够改善血液循环，有助于预防经济舱综合征。

sentences.en: Officials say they'll spare no expense to prevent another riot.
sentences.cn: 官员说他们会不惜一切地阻止再次发生暴乱。

sentences.en: Police are out in force to prevent a recurrence of the violence.
sentences.cn: 警方出动大量警力防止暴力事件再次发生。

sentences.en: Riot police are being deployed throughout the city to prevent any trouble.
sentences.cn: 正在全城部署防暴警察以防止发生骚乱。

sentences.en: Smear Vaseline on to your baby's skin to prevent soreness.
sentences.cn: 给孩子皮肤上抹些凡士林以防止肿痛。

sentences.en: Stir the custard occasionally to prevent a skin forming.
sentences.cn: 要不时地搅拌牛奶蛋糊，防止其表面结皮。

sentences.en: The cables are all bright yellow to prevent you tripping over them.
sentences.cn: 电缆都是亮黄色，以防绊倒人。

sentences.en: The house has been barred and bolted to prevent re-entry.
sentences.cn: 房子已经被封了，门被闩上，防止有人入内。

sentences.en: The police have been trying to prevent them carrying weapons.
sentences.cn: 警方一直都设法阻止他们携带武器。

sentences.en: The rules are intended to prevent accidents.
sentences.cn: 这些规定旨在预防事故。

sentences.en: The security forces had to intervene to prevent the situation worsening.
sentences.cn: 安全部队不得不介入，以防止局势进一步恶化。

sentences.en: We recognized the possibility and took steps to prevent it happening.
sentences.cn: 我们认识到了这种可能性，并且采取了一些预防措施。

sentences.en: We were prevented from entering the site.
Wrap small ornaments in paper to prevent them being damaged.
sentences.cn: 把小饰品用纸包上以免损坏。

words.tran_cn: 预期的；以前的；预防的；先行的
可预防的；可阻止的；可防止的

phrases.tran_cn: 防治污染；预防和控制污染

trans.tran_en: to stop something from happening, or stop someone from doing something
